thread.title: It's a me, Mario! At 30, Super Mario Maker lets players become creators
thread.title_full: It's a me, Mario! At 30, Super Mario Maker lets players become creators - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: It's a me, Mario! At 30, Super Mario Maker lets players become creators
text: It’s been 30 years since Super Mario Bros. helped revitalize an industry many thought dead in the 1980s. Now Nintendo is handing the tools to its fans with Super Mario Maker, a game that lets you create your own levels. »
